name: Ski- & Bergchalet Penkenjoch
description:
Holidays above the clouds! 

Well.... at least 2100 meter above sea level - which is usually above could base! Treat yourself to this unique holiday experience on top of the Alps! 
At th highest point of the ski resort “Zillertal 3000”, there is a mountain hut waiting for you. Cuddle up in front of the fireplace on a stormy winter day or use this 150 sqm appartment as a base camp for a hike to the Rastkogel (2762 m). To get to the chalet just park your car at the gondola station in Finkenberg and it will take you to the very top only 30 meters away from to the “Bergchalet”. 
There is one bedroom for two; another room with two single beds and the sofa bed in the living room, which accommodates another two guests. 

Of course you will not have to miss out on central heating, bathroom with bath tub, infrared sauna, cable TV or a balcony and kitchenette (including fridge, cooker with 3 plates, microwave, dishwasher, Nespresso coffee machine - without capsules). Even the wood for the fireplace is stacked! You can also get daily fresh bread from the neighbor restaurant "Penkentenne". The price of the Ski & Bergchalet Penkenjoch doesn´t include the local tax and final cleaning.  

The price of the Ski & Bergchalet Penkenjoch doesn´t include the local tax and final cleaning.
 
150m2 - 2 to 6 people
To inquire about a stay at the Bergchalet, please contact us directly at info@apparthotel.com - or call us at: +43 5285 63347
The prices are excl. final cleaning and tax
Preise Ski- und Bergchalet Penkenjoch exklusive Endreinigung p.P. € 20 
Travelling by Car
Via the Inntalautobahn A12 motorway until the exit for Zillertal, from there take the B169 Zillertal Road for the next 30 km to Finkenberg.

Attention: The only possibilty to reach the Chalet is through the cable car of the Finkenberger Almbahnen.
